name: design_templates
description: Templates de prompts probados para generación de imágenes de productos

food_lifestyle.template: Lifestyle food photography of {product}, {visual_description}, placed on {surface} in a cozy {setting}, warm natural window lighting creating soft shadows, {props} as styling elements, shallow depth of field with bokeh background, appetizing and inviting mood, steam or freshness visible, rule of thirds composition with clear {text_zone} for text overlay, warm color palette with {brand_colors} accents, authentic homemade feel, 8K detail, sharp focus on product
food_lifestyle.negative: cold lighting, plastic containers, artificial colors, cluttered, fast food aesthetic

food_minimal.template: Minimalist food photography of {product}, {visual_description}, centered on {surface}, soft studio lighting with clean shadows, {background} background, professional composition with ample negative space in {text_zone}, {brand_colors} subtle accents, appetizing presentation, commercial quality, 8K sharp focus, elegant simplicity
food_minimal.negative: busy background, many props, harsh shadows, cluttered, casual styling

beverage_refreshing.template: Professional beverage photography of {product}, {visual_description}, condensation droplets visible on surface, {ice_style}, backlit creating rim glow and transparency, placed on {surface} with {props}, refreshing and crisp mood, shallow depth of field, clear {text_zone} for overlay, {brand_colors} color harmony, commercial quality, 8K detail
beverage_refreshing.negative: warm tones for cold drink, flat lighting, dry appearance, no condensation

product_minimal.template: Professional product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, centered on {background} background, soft studio lighting with subtle shadows at 30-degree angle, minimalist composition showing product dimension and texture, ample negative space in {text_zone} for text, {brand_colors} color accents in props, sharp focus throughout, commercial e-commerce quality, 8K detail, photorealistic
product_minimal.negative: cluttered, busy background, harsh shadows, distracting elements, amateur lighting

product_editorial.template: Editorial product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, dramatic {lighting} lighting creating bold shadows, {composition} composition, {background} backdrop, fashion magazine aesthetic, strong visual impact, bold negative space on {text_zone} for headline text, {brand_colors} as accent elements, premium luxury feel, high contrast, 8K commercial quality
product_editorial.negative: flat lighting, centered boring composition, amateur, soft shadows, generic

product_authentic.template: Authentic product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, placed on {surface} with natural textures, soft window daylight with gentle natural shadows, {props} creating artisanal context, subtle imperfections that feel real and tactile, warm earthy color palette with {brand_colors}, handcrafted aesthetic, clear {text_zone} for text, organic and genuine mood, 8K detail with natural film-like quality
product_authentic.negative: overly perfect, artificial, plastic, synthetic, sterile, over-processed, too polished

product_biophilic.template: Biophilic product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, surrounded by {natural_elements}, natural golden hour or window lighting, green plants and organic materials creating nature-integrated composition, fresh and alive feeling, sustainable aesthetic, {text_zone} for text overlay, {brand_colors} complementing natural greens, earthy color palette, 8K detail, authentic outdoor or greenhouse feel
product_biophilic.negative: artificial plants, plastic, synthetic materials, indoor sterile environment, fake nature

beauty_luxury.template: Luxury beauty product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, on {surface} with {props}, soft diffused studio lighting creating elegant highlights on packaging, premium feel with gold or metallic accents, sophisticated composition with {text_zone} for text, {brand_colors} complementing luxurious mood, high-end magazine aesthetic, 8K sharp detail on textures and finishes
beauty_luxury.negative: cheap looking, harsh shadows on packaging, cluttered, drugstore aesthetic

tech_modern.template: Modern tech product photography of {product}, {visual_description}, floating or placed on {surface}, clean studio lighting with subtle reflections, sleek minimalist composition showing product design details, {background} background with {text_zone} for text, {brand_colors} accent lighting or props, premium technology aesthetic, sharp focus on device details, 8K commercial quality
tech_modern.negative: cluttered cables, busy backgrounds, outdated aesthetics, amateur lighting

lighting.soft_studio: soft studio lighting with even diffused illumination
lighting.golden_hour: warm golden hour sunlight with long soft shadows
lighting.natural_window: natural window light creating gentle directional shadows
lighting.dramatic: dramatic high-contrast lighting with defined shadows
lighting.backlit: backlit with rim lighting and ethereal glow

quality.commercial: commercial photography quality, 8K detail, sharp focus throughout
quality.editorial: editorial magazine quality, professional retouching, high resolution
quality.authentic: authentic aesthetic with natural film-like quality

composition.rule_of_thirds: rule of thirds composition with product at intersection
composition.centered: centered symmetric composition with balanced negative space
composition.diagonal: dynamic diagonal composition creating visual movement
composition.asymmetric: asymmetric composition with intentional visual tension

mood.warm_inviting: warm and inviting atmosphere, cozy feeling
mood.fresh_clean: fresh and clean mood, crisp aesthetic
mood.playful: playful and energetic mood, vibrant feeling
mood.authentic: authentic and genuine mood, real and tactile

text_zones.top_center: clear negative space in upper third for headline text
text_zones.bottom_left: open area in bottom-left corner for price badge
text_zones.left_third: negative space on left side for vertical text
text_zones.right_third: empty area on right side for overlay
